attributes.action: Ensure the May 2025 local elections go ahead
attributes.background:
We the Public demand that the May 2025 local elections go ahead.
It is not acceptable for the current Labour Government to cancel these elections- the Public must be allowed to vote.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Do not postpone the local elections
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/710155
